mapper.insert: insert into users (id, name, login_name, state, ability, roles, password, password_key, corporation_id, phone, avatar, address, address_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ability,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roles,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{passwordKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{corporationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addressId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update users set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, login_name = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ability = #{ability,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, roles = #{roles,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password_key = #{passwordKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, corporation_id = #{corporationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, avatar = #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address_id = #{addressId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, name, login_name, state, ability, roles, password, password_key, corporation_id, phone, avatar, address, address_id from users where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, name, login_name, state, ability, roles, password, password_key, corporation_id, phone, avatar, address, address_id from users
